duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, integrate, and support real-time mission-critical software for the autonomy stack
Work with research engineers to develop maintainable, testable, and robust software designs
Architect and implement solutions to complex issues in the large software stack
Guide and ensure best SDLC practices while contributing to improving the safety in the core autonomy stack
Collaborate with Infrastructure and DevOps teams for efficient, secure, and scalable software delivery to the autonomous fleet
Mentor autonomy researchers and algorithm developers to ensure efficient running of components with optimal compute and memory usage
Review and refine technical requirements and translate them into high-level design and plans to support the development of safe AV technology
Conduct code and design reviews and advise on technical matters

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Robotics, or a related degree (Master's or PhD preferred)
